title: Patch problem
body:
I'm stuck at 32% and constantly scans files , more than 10k,Patch takes forever..
can someone help me i need help :/
i try to delete folders in RADS still not work

replies.body:
Hey cherrythepro35, 

If you're still having the issue and your patcher isn't up and running you can use Riots Patcher KB and it should fix you up. Make sure to follow all the steps though :)

Patcher KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Give it some time, patches can take a while to complete. :)
